column1: | age 75 of birmingham made her transition on friday (june 19
column2: 2015). she was a resident of jefferson county. service of memory will be wednesday at 11:00 a. m. at westside funeral chapel fairfield
column4: with interment in george washington carver cemetery. her loving survivors are: one devoted daughter; cassandra (dexter) irby
column10: viola mims hollie and christine mims carpenter. the remains will lie in repose on tuesday at the funeral home from 12:00 until 7:00 p. m. westside funeral fairfield directing.
